p: Finally, the reliability of the TTP diagram shall be discussed. All heat flow curves were shifted horizontally by Δ t (for a definition of Δ t, see Figure 4 and the related text). The amount of Δ t varied between −2.7 s to +1.4 s; see Figure 14. As the largest values of Δ t are present at high temperatures, where the peak times are also relatively large, the influence of the time shift, Δ t, on the evaluated peak times is relatively small.
